mapper.select:
select * from ( select m.*,rownum rn from ( select t1.jhkgsj,t1.jhwgsj,t1.sjdw,t1.sjpfdw,t1.pfwh,t1.pfsj,t1.pfztz,t1.jhsybzje,t1.jhsydfzcje,t1.sfsqablbz,t1.ablbzsqwh,t1.xdsj,t1.sjkgsj, t1.yjjgsj,t1.sgdw,t1.jldw,t1.jsdw,t1.gys,t1.htje,t1.sjwgsj,t1.sbnf, t3.qlmc,t3.qlbh,t3.qlzxzh,t3.xzqhmc,t3.xzqhdm,t3.gydw,t3.lxmc,t3.lxbm,t3.qlkd,t3.qlqc,t3.xjgjnd,t3.xmnf,t2.faspsj,t2.jsxz from PLAN_WQGZ t1 left join SCK_WQGZ t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_WQGZ t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where 1=1
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t3.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t3.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t3.qlbh ) m where rownum<=(#{page} * #{rows}) ) where RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

select count(*) from PLAN_WQGZ t1 left join SCK_WQGZ t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_WQGZ t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where 1=1
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t3.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t3.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'

select * from ( select m.*,rownum rn from ( select t1.jhnf ,t1.jhkgsj,t1.jhwgsj,t1.sjdw,t1.sjpfdw,t1.pfwh,t1.pfsj,t1.pfztz,t1.jhsybbzje ,t1.jhsydfzczj ,t1.sfsqablbz,t1.ablbzsqwh,t1.xdsj,t1.sjkgsj, t1.yjwgsj,t1.sgdw,t1.jldw,t1.jsdw,t1.gys,t1.htje,t1.sjwgsj,t1.kgzt,t1.jgzt,t1.wjgyy,t1.sgxkwj,t1.jgtcwj,t1.jgyswj, t3.gydw,t3.xzqhdm,t3.xzqhmc,t3.tbbmbm,t3.lxjsdj,t3.lxbm,t3.lxmc,t3.qdzh,t3.zdzh,t3.qzlc,t3.yhlc,t3.gjxjnd,t3.yhnr,t3.xmnf,t3.xmtype,t3.bz, t2.tzgs,t2.spwh,t2.fapgdw,t2.fascdw,t2.faspsj,t2.jsxz,t2.jsnr,t2.scbz from PLAN_ABGC t1 left join SCK_ABGC t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_ABGC t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where 1=1
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t3.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t3.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t3.lxbm ) m where rownum<=(#{page} * #{rows}) ) where RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

select count(*) from PLAN_ABGC t1 left join SCK_ABGC t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_ABGC t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where 1=1
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t3.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t3.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'

select * from ( select m.*,rownum rn from ( select t1.sbnf,t1.jhkgsj,t1.jhwgsj,t1.sjdw,t1.sjpfdw,t1.pfwh,t1.pfsj,t1.pfztz,t1.jhsybzje,t1.jhsydfzcje,t1.sfsqablbz,t1.ablbzsqwh,t1.gkbglj,t1.gkbgmc,t1.sjsgtlj,t1.sjsgtmc,t1.bz jhbz,t1.xdsj,t1.sjkgsj,t1.SCKID jhid, t1.yjwgsj ,t1.sgdw,t1.jldw,t1.jsdw,t1.gys,t1.htje,t1.sjwgsj,t1.kgzt,t1.jgzt,t1.wjgyy,t1.sgxkwj,t1.jgtcwj,t1.jgyswj, t3.gydw,t3.xzqhdm,t3.xzqhmc,t3.lxjsdj,t3.lxbm,t3.lxmc,t3.qdzh,t3.zdzh,t3.qzlc,t3.yhlc,t3.gjxjnd,t3.yhnr,t3.xmnf,t3.xmtype,t3.bz, t2.tzgs,t2.spwh,t2.fapgdw,t2.fascdw,t2.faspsj,t2.jsxz,t2.jsnr,t2.scbz from PLAN_ZHFZ t1 left join SCK_ZHFZ t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_ZHFZ t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where 1=1
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t3.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t3.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t3.lxbm ) m where rownum<=(#{page} * #{rows}) ) where RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

select count(*) from PLAN_ZHFZ t1 left join SCK_ZHFZ t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_ZHFZ t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where 1=1
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t3.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t3.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'

select * from ( select m.*,rownum rn from ( select t1.lxmc,t1.lxbm,t1.yjsdj,t1.qdzh,t1.zdzh,t1.qzlc,t1.gydw,t1.gydwbm,t1.xzqhdm,t1.xzqhmc,t1.xmlc, t2.fapgdw,t2.fascdw,t2.faspsj,t2.spwh,t2.jsxz, t2.jhnf,t2.jhkgsj,t2.jhwgsj,t2.id id,t2.xmmc,t2.sftqss,t2.sjdw,t2.sjpfdw,t2.jsjsbz,t2.gjhjsdj, t2.pfwh,t2.pfsj,t2.pftz,t2.jhsybbzje ,t2.jhsydfzczj ,t1.id jhid, t2.sfsqablbz,t2.ablbzsqwh,t2.gkbgmc,t2.sjsgtmc,t2.remarks, t2.xdsj,t2.sjkgsj,t2.sjwgsj,t2.kgzt,t2.jgzt,t2.yjwgsj,t2.sfqxkg,t2.jsdw,t2.sgdw,t2.jldw,t2.htje,t2.sgxkwj,t2.jgtcwj,t2.jgyswj,t2.gsztz,t2.wjgyy from PLAN_LX_GCSJ t1 left join PLAN_GCSJ t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where 1=1
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t1.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t1.lxbm ) m where rownum<=(#{page} * #{rows}) ) where RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

select count(*) from PLAN_LX_GCSJ t1 left join PLAN_GCSJ t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where 1=1
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t1.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'

select * from ( select m.*,rownum rn from ( select t1.lxmc,t1.lxbm,t1.xzqhdm,t1.xzqhmc,t1.jsdd,t1.gydw,t1.gydwbm,t1.bhnr,t1.qdzh,t1.zdzh,t1.qzlc,t1.yhlc,t1.ylmlx,t1.bz lxbz,t1.yjsdj, t2.fapgdw,t2.fascdw,t2.faspsj,t2.spwh,t2.tzgs,t2.jsxz,t2.jsnr,t2.bz jhbz,t2.id id,t2.wjgyy,t2.scbz,t1.id jhid, t2.sbnf,t2.jhkgsj,t2.jhwgsj,t2.xmmc,t2.lmkd,t2.sftqss,t2.sjdw,t2.yhlb,t2.dc,t2.jc,t2.mc,t2.sjpfdw,t2.pfwh,t2.pfsj,t2.pfztz,t2.jhsybzje,t2.jhsydfzcje,t2.sjlmlx,t2.sfsqablbz,t2.ablbzsqwh,t2.sfgyhbm,t2.gkbgmc,t2.sjsgtmc,t2.xdsj,t2.sjkgsj,t2.sjwgsj,t2.kgzt,t2.jgzt,t2.yjwgsj,t2.sfqxkg,t2.jsdw,t2.sgdw,t2.jldw,t2.htje,t2.sgxkwj,t2.jgtcwj,t2.jgyswj,t2.wjsczt,t2.gsztz from PLAN_LX_GCGJ t1 left join PLAN_GCGJ t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where 1=1
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t1.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t1.lxbm ) m where rownum<=(#{page} * #{rows}) ) where RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

select count(*) from PLAN_LX_GCGJ t1 left join PLAN_GCGJ t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where 1=1
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t1.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'

select * from ( select m.*,rownum rn from ( select t2.sbnf,t1.lxmc,t1.lxbm,t1.gydwmc,t1.gydwdm gydwbm,t1.qdzh,t1.zdzh,t1.qzlc,t1.hdlc,t1.xzqhdm,t1.xzqhmc,t1.yjsdj,t1.ylmkd,t1.ylmlx,t1.ylmhd,t1.ylmjg, t2.description sczmsj,t2.xchsqk,t2.qtbz, t2.jhkgsj,t2.jhwgsj, t2.classify,t2.reportingfee,t2.fee,t2.newfee,t2.totalinvest,t2.totalplacefund,t2.totalsubsidyfund,t2.accumulativesubsidyfund, t2.nowyearsubsidyfund,t2.dianceng,t2.jiceng,t2.surface,t2.pqi,t2.planhistorycompara,t2.aadt,t2.constructnumber, t2.replynumber,t2.devisenumbder,t2.spsj,t2.plandownnumber,t2.remarks,t1.jhid,t2.id,
t2.xdsj,t2.sjkgsj,t2.sjwgsj,t2.kgzt,t2.jgzt,t2.yjwgsj,t2.jsdw,t2.sgdw,t2.jldw,t2.htje,t2.sgxkwj,t2.jgtcwj,t2.jgyswj,t2.gys,t2.wjgyy from PLAN_LX_YHDZX t1 left join PLAN_YHDZX t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where 1=1
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t1.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t1.lxbm ) m where rownum<=(#{page} * #{rows}) ) where RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

select count(*) from PLAN_LX_YHDZX t1 left join PLAN_YHDZX t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where 1=1
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t1.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'

select * from ( select m.*,rownum rn from ( select t1.lxmc,t1.lxbm,t1.xzqhdm,t1.xzqhmc,t1.jsdd,t1.gydw,t1.gydwbm,t1.bhnr,t1.qdzh,t1.zdzh,t1.qzlc,t1.yhlc,t1.ylmlx,t1.bz lxbz,t1.yjsdj,t2.id jhid, t2.fapgdw,t2.fascdw,t2.faspsj,t2.spwh,t2.tzgs,t2.jsxz,t2.jsnr,t2.jhbz,t2.id id,t2.wjgyy,t2.scbz, t2.sbnf,t2.jhkgsj,t2.jhwgsj,t2.xmmc,t2.lmkd,t2.sftqss,t2.sjdw,t2.yhlb,t2.dc,t2.jc,t2.mc,t2.sjpfdw,t2.pfwh,t2.pfsj,t2.pfztz,t2.jhsybzje,t2.jhsydfzcje,t2.sjlmlx,t2.sfsqablbz,t2.ablbzsqwh,t2.sfgyhbm,t2.gkbgmc,t2.sjsgtmc,t2.xdsj,t2.sjkgsj,t2.sjwgsj,t2.kgzt,t2.jgzt,t2.yjwgsj,t2.sfqxkg,t2.jsdw,t2.sgdw,t2.jldw,t2.htje,t2.sgxkwj,t2.jgtcwj,t2.jgyswj,t2.wjsczt,t2.gsztz from PLAN_LX_SHUIH t1 left join PLAN_SHUIH t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where 1=1
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t1.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t1.lxbm ) m where rownum<=(#{page} * #{rows}) ) where RN>((#{page} - 1) * #{rows})

select count(*) from PLAN_LX_SHUIH t1 left join PLAN_SHUIH t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where 1=1
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.xzqhdm in(select id from xtgl_xzqh where id=#{xzqhdm} or parent=#{xzqhdm})
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t1.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'

select ${colName} from PLAN_WQGZ t1 left join SCK_WQGZ t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_WQGZ t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where 1=1
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||rtrim(#{gydw},0)||'%'
and t3.xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqhdm},0)||'%'
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t3.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t3.qlbh

select ${colName} from PLAN_ABGC t1 left join SCK_ABGC t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_ABGC t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where 1=1
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||rtrim(#{gydw},0)||'%'
and t3.xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqhdm},0)||'%'
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t3.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t3.lxbm

select ${colName} from PLAN_ZHFZ t1 left join SCK_ZHFZ t2 on t1.SCKID=t2.SCKID left join XMK_ZHFZ t3 on t2.xmkid=t3.id where 1=1
and t3.gydwbm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t3.xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqhdm},0)||'%'
and t1.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t3.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t3.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t3.lxbm

select ${colName} from PLAN_LX_GCSJ t1 left join PLAN_GCSJ t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where 1=1
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqhdm},0)||'%'
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t1.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t1.lxbm

select ${colName} from PLAN_LX_GCGJ t1 left join PLAN_GCGJ t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where 1=1
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqhdm},0)||'%'
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t1.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t1.lxbm

select ${colName} from PLAN_LX_YHDZX t1 left join PLAN_YHDZX t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where 1=1
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqhdm},0)||'%'
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t1.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t1.lxbm

select ${colName} from PLAN_LX_SHUIH t1 left join PLAN_SHUIH t2 on t1.jhid=t2.id where 1=1
and t1.gydwdm like '%'||trim(#{gydw})||'%'
and t1.xzqhdm like rtrim(#{xzqhdm},0)||'%'
and t2.kgzt like '%'||trim(#{kgzt})||'%'
and t1.lxmc like '%'||trim(#{lxmc})||'%'
and t1.lxbm like '%'||trim(#{lxbm})||'%'
order by t1.lxbm
